title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents: Stories That Scared Even Me
description: Alfred Hitchcock speaking:"... the stories in this book all gave me one or more of the pleasurable sensations associated with fear. Some quite terrified me. Some profoundly disturbed me... Others prickled my nerve ends pleasurably, touched my spine with chills, or made me swallow hard... Some did several of these things at once. On that basis, I offer them to you..."
author: Alfred Hitchcock
